name: Kek Jump
description:
One day Kek, the beloved mistreated pooch, saw in his dream lots of dogs in the moon, and running from reality, he tried to reach this beautiful natural sattelite.

Now it's your time to help Kek follow his dream!

[EDIT] This is a really EARLY release! Features like the Shop, Scoreboard, Daily reward and Achievements are currently under construction.
